input.sentences: my daughter making the grandchildren 's easter baskets .
my grandson was so happy with how his easter basket turned out .
my other grand son took all of his stuffing out and said it looked like a birds nest .
my daughter hiding eggs in the back yard .
my grandson caught the most of all the kids today .
output.sentences: Barb had her daughter and grandchildren over for Easter.
Her grandson was happy it was finally Easter which meant time for candy!
Barb invited her neighbors son over who said he was going to use the grass stuffing from his basket to make a bird's nest.
Indeed, he ended up making the nest which Barb later took outside and used for hiding some of the Easter eggs.
Barb enjoyed watching the kids have fun and laughed hysterically when her grandson told her he had "caught" the most eggs.
